Description: On Rt. 688 in the County of Mecklenburg, in the vicinity of Wilkerson Rd; Rt. 677E/W (Mecklenburg County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Standing Water - Closed

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 195 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east exit 195 is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 296.9 in the City of Chesapeake, near Yadkin Road, motorists can expect potential delays due to an incident. The east left shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic
